content: **crocheted jacket in drops babymerino the piece is worked in a square with fans lace pattern and stripes sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-055 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops babymerino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-100-100-100-100-100 g colour 20 dark grey 500-550-600-650-700-750 g colour 38 olive ------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece **crochet gauge ** 20 treble_crochet crochets in width and 7 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm diagram a 4 measures approx 2½ cm in width crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm the hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size *please note that the us-pattern will be available online soon*
